name: smf-to-ym2151log-rust
description: Convert Standard MIDI Files to YM2151 register write logs (WASM build)

scripts.fetch-pkg: mkdir -p pkg && curl -fL -o pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.js https://cat2151.github.io/smf-to-ym2151log-rust/pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.js && curl -fL -o pkg/smf_to_ym2151log_bg.wasm https://cat2151.github.io/smf-to-ym2151log-rust/pkg/smf_to_ym2151log_bg.wasm && curl -fL -o pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.d.ts https://cat2151.github.io/smf-to-ym2151log-rust/pkg/smf_to_ym2151log.d.ts && curl -fL -o pkg/package.json https://cat2151.github.io/smf-to-ym2151log-rust/pkg/package.json
